subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
Usage notes
subSections.text: Only found in compounds. Not as common as the ''bu'' reading.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ぶ}}

# [[courage]], [[ferocity]], [[valor]]
# [[military]] [[power]], [[force]] of [[arms]]
# the [[act]] of [[carry out|carrying out]] military force: a [[battle]], a [[war]]
# the [[way]] of [[carry out|carrying out]] military force: [[strategy]], [[tactics]], [[martial art]]s
# a [[military]] [[person]]: an [[officer]], a [[soldier]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=ぶ|obsolete}} a [[unit]] of [[length]], equivalent to half of a {{m|ja|歩|tr=bu|pos=six {{m|ja|尺|tr=shaku}}, roughly six [[feet]] or 1.8 [[meter]]s}}, roughly equivalent to one [[yard]] or 90 [[centimeter]]s

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|武威|ぶい}}: [[military]] [[power]], military [[authority]], military [[influence]] over something
* {{ja-r|武%運|ぶ%うん}}: [[military]] [[fortune]], [[luck]] in [[battle]]
* {{ja-r|武衛|ぶえい}}: a [[bodyguard]] to an [[imperial]] [[prince]]; a [[shogun]], a [[generalissimo]]
* {{ja-r|武恩|ぶおん}}: a [[favor]] received from a [[shogun]] or [[samurai]] family
* {{ja-r|武火|ぶか}}: a [[fierce]] [[fire]], a [[raging]] fire
* {{ja-r|武%学|ぶ%がく}}: [[military]] [[studies]]
* {{ja-r|武官|ぶかん}}: a [[military]] [[officer]]
* {{ja-r|武漢|^ぶかん}}: [[Wuhan]], [[China]]
* {{ja-r|武鑑|ぶかん}}: in the [[w:Edo period|Edo period]], a [[registry]] listing all the [[samurai]] families by [[name]], {{m|ja|家紋|tr=kamon||family [[crest]]}}, [[income]], [[castle]]s or other [[residence]]s, and the names of any [[follower]]s
* {{ja-r|武器|ぶき}}: a [[weapon]]
* {{ja-r|武技|ぶぎ}}: [[martial]] [[technique]]: [[martial arts]]
* {{ja-r|武家|ぶけ}}: a [[samurai]] family; the samurai [[class]]
* {{ja-r|武芸|ぶげい}}: [[military]] [[art]]s, military [[accomplishment]]s
* {{ja-r|武具|ぶぐ}}: [[military]] [[gear]]: more specifically, [[weapon]]s and [[armor]]
* {{ja-r|武勲|ぶくん}}: [[distinguished]] [[military]] [[service]]
* {{ja-r|武庫|ぶこ}}: an [[armory]], a [[storage]] [[facility]] for military [[gear]]
* {{ja-r|武功|ぶこう}}: [[military]] [[feat]]s or [[exploit]]s
* {{ja-r|武江|^ぶこう}}: alternate name for {{m|ja|江戸|tr=Edo}}
* {{ja-r|武%骨|ぶ%こつ}}: [[clumsy]], [[rude]], [[oafish]]; [[useless]], [[stupid]]; [[inconvenient]]; [[stiff]] and [[angular]] {{qualifier|of personality}}
* {{ja-r|武左|ぶざ}}: [[boorish]], [[hickish]]
* {{ja-r|武士|ぶし}}: a [[warrior]], a [[samurai]]
* {{ja-r|武事|ぶじ}}: [[military]] [[matter]]s
* {{ja-r|武%術|ぶ%じゅつ}}: [[martial arts]]
* {{ja-r|武昌|^ぶしょう}}: [[Wuchang]], [[China]]
* {{ja-r|武神|ぶしん}}: a [[god]] of [[war]]
* {{ja-r|武臣|ぶしん}}: a [[military]] [[minister]], a minister of military [[affair]]s
* {{ja-r|武人|ぶじん}}: a [[warrior]], a [[soldier]]
{{der-bottom}}
